answerText: gaucho literature[10] Perhaps the most famous work of gaucho literature is this Argentine epic written by Jose Hernandez, whose title character is reunited with his sons at the end.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | UC Irvine and Michigan State A | 11 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Examples of this type of literature include the mock epic Fausto by Estanislao del Campo, as well as the poems of Rafael Obligado.  [10] Identify this style of literature that imitates the payadas sung by South American cowboys.
